text: Torsøvej station is a railway station serving the district of Risskov in the northern part of the city of Aarhus in Jutland, Denmark. The station is located on the Grenaa Line between Aarhus and Grenaa. The train services are currently operated by the railway company DSB which runs frequent local train services between Aarhus and Grenaa as part of the Aarhus Commuter Rail service. == References == ==External links== * Banedanmark * DSB Category:Railway stations in Denmark Category:Transport in Aarhus
title: Torsøvej station
